Package.Name: libxcb-32bit-devel
Package.Description: The libxcb package provides an interface to the X Window System protocol, which replaces the current Xlib interface. Xlib can also use XCB as a transport layer, allowing software to make requests and receive responses with both.

Update.Comment:
Update libxcb to 1.14
**Changelog:** - Add xcb_total_read() and xcb_total_written() API - Support check >= 0.13 API (for make check) - Bug fix to handle EINTR from recvmsg
Update.Name: F. von Gellhorn

Update.Comment: drop action.py which is not needed
Update.Name: F. von Gellhorn

Update.Comment:
Update libxcb to 1.13.1
Summary: Don't flag extra reply in xcb_take_socket
Signed-off-by: Pierre-Yves <pyu@riseup.net>
Test Plan: Unit tests are OK
Reviewers: #triage_team, sunnyflunk
Reviewed By: #triage_team, sunnyflunk
Differential Revision: https://dev.getsol.us/D4060
Update.Name: Pierre-Yves

Package.Name: xorgproto
Package.Description: This package provides the headers and specification documents defining the core protocol and (many) extensions for the X Window System. The extensions are those common among servers descended from X.Org 6.7. It also includes a number of headers that aren't purely protocol related, but are depended upon by many other X Window System packages to provide common definitions and porting layer.

Update.Comment:
Update to 2021.5
**Changelog** - Introduces V2.4 of the X Input Protocol that understands the concept of touchpad gestures.
Update.Name: Joey Riches

Update.Comment:
Update xorgproto to 2019.2
Summary: Update xorgproto to 2019.2
**Changelog:**
- [2019.2](https://www.mail-archive.com/xorg@lists.x.org/msg06079.html) - [2019.1](https://www.mail-archive.com/xorg-announce@lists.x.org/msg01211.html)
Test Plan: the system runs still fine and every rev dependency got build without any issues
Reviewers: #triage_team, JoshStrobl
Reviewed By: #triage_team, JoshStrobl
Subscribers: JoshStrobl
Tags: #requires_rebuilds
Differential Revision: https://dev.getsol.us/D7780
Update.Name: F. von Gellhorn

Update.Comment:
Initial commit of xorgproto to replace individual packages
Signed-off-by: Peter O'Connor <peter@solus-project.com>
Update.Name: Peter O'Connor

Package.Name: xdg-desktop-portal-devel
Package.Description: A portal frontend service for Flatpak and possibly other desktop containment frameworks. xdg-desktop-portal works by exposing a series of D-Bus interfaces known as portals under a well-known name (org.freedesktop.portal.Desktop) and object path (/org/freedesktop/portal/desktop). The portal interfaces include APIs for file access, opening URIs, printing and others.

Update.Comment:
Update to 1.10.1
**Changelog** - Reverts a breaking change to the screencast and inhibit portal
Update.Name: Joey Riches

Update.Comment:
Update to 1.10.0
**Changelog:**
- Add power profile monitor implementation - Remap /run/flatpak/app, for Flatpak 1.11.x - Remap /var/config and /var/data - location: Fix accuracy levels - openuri: Use real path for OpenDirectory - permission-store: Avoid a crash - permissions-store: Add GetPermission - screencast: Add 'virtual' source type
Update.Name: Joshua Strobl

Update.Comment:
Update to 1.8.1
**Summarized Changelog:**
- documents: Add snap support - filechooser: Fix directory support - openuri: Fix an fd leak - snap: Use cgroups to identify confined apps - wallpaper: Fix a crash
Update.Name: Joshua Strobl

Update.Comment:
Update to 1.8.0
**Changelog:**
- camera: Don't leak pipewire proxy - camera: Make the client node visible - filechooser: Return the current filter - openuri: Allow skipping the chooser for more URL tyles - openuri: Robustness fixes
Update.Name: Joshua Strobl

Update.Comment:
Update xdg-desktop-portal to 1.0.3
Summary: - Fix an option name in the remote desktop portal - document-portal: Validate permissions and report errors - Fix life-cycle issues with inodes in the document portal - Improve the test coverage of the documents portal - Add a 'coverage' make target
Signed-off-by: Pierre-Yves <pyu@riseup.net>
Test Plan: Successfully build `xdg-desktop-portal-gtk` against this package
Reviewers: #triage_team, sunnyflunk
Reviewed By: #triage_team, sunnyflunk
Differential Revision: https://dev.getsol.us/D3994
Update.Name: Pierre-Yves

Update.Comment:
Update xdg-desktop-portal to 1.0.2
Summary: - networkmonitor: Fix several issues - inhibit: Add session state monitoring
Depends on D3838
Signed-off-by: Pierre-Yves <pyu@riseup.net>
Test Plan: Successfully build xdg-desktop-portal-gtk 1.0.2 against this package
Reviewers: #triage_team, JoshStrobl
Reviewed By: #triage_team, JoshStrobl
Differential Revision: https://dev.getsol.us/D3839
Update.Name: Pierre-Yves
